name: Corre Sam!
description:
Hi! Thanks for playing my first Unity game

In ¡Corre Sam! you'd need to defeat zombies to score. Unlock characters with collected coins and complete achievements!

The interface language is currently only in Spanish but you only need to know 1 word to play it: "Jugar" = "Play". Thanks for give it a try!

Controls:

Arrows or WASD to move the character. Left click to shoot


Hola! gracias por probar mi primer juego desarrollado en Unity!

En ¡Corre Sam! elimina zombis para puntuar, desbloquea personajes con las monedas recolectadas y completa los logros.

Controles:

Usa las flechas del teclado o WASD para mover el personaje y click izquierdo para disparar.
